windowclass.name: referencemanualpage
windowclass.script:
function onInit() if super and super.onInit then super.onInit() end registerMenuItem(Interface.getString("library_recordtype_label_cascadewindows"), "cascade_icon_windowcontrol", 6) registerMenuItem(Interface.getString("dropdown_menu_cascadesimilar"), "cascade_icon_windowcontrol", 6, 8) end
function onMenuSelection(selection, subselection) if selection == 6 and subselection == 8 then if self.getClass then fCascadeWindows.cascadeSimilarWindows(self:getClass()) else Debug.console("Cascade: self has no getClass method.") end end end
